title: Ticket #3912: Stress test via workspace parallel testing
description:
Thesis: Tests are failing due to htcondor tools are not being serviced. Given tests call runCondorTool which has a TOOL_TIMEOUT of 10 and a number a retries on top of that, we believe we should always succeed to get this info.

runCondorTool now attempts 12+ times to run tool with increasing wait time before tries. It tells "runcmd"(our tool of choice) that any result is acceptable thus allowing retries to fire. It also can pass an arbitrary string for the runcmd emit_output header. Currently passing in attempt count. Still have not seen a higher account # yet..... Create runToolNTimes as a system call replacement which runs through runCondorTool.
